name: Vanco Play
description: Master music selector with 30+ years experience, perfect for private parties.
bio:
üéß Vanco Play ‚Äì a true master of musical storytelling.
With a career that began at just 12 years old, Vanco has worked as a DJ, radio host, and moderator, but prefers to call himself a music selector. His passion lies in crafting the perfect playlist, blending genres with precision and soul. Thanks to his vast experience, he is also highly sought after for private parties, where his ability to read the crowd and create the perfect vibe truly shines.

A true expert in Disco Soul, Jazz House, Funk, Jazz, Blues, and Retro, Vanco Play transforms every set into a unique musical journey that connects deeply with his audience.

name: Mario
description: Ohrid DJ since 2006, mixing Disco, Funky, Afro House, and nostalgic retro hits.
bio:
üéß DJ Mario, an Ohrid-based DJ active since 2006, is a passionate vinyl collector and music lover, blending sounds from retro to modern eras. His sets unite Disco, Funky, Club, and Afro House, along with nostalgic retro hits that ignite unforgettable energy on the dance floor.

With a commitment to strictly high-quality, timeless tracks, DJ Mario creates a unique atmosphere that keeps the crowd moving all night.

name: Urban Planet
description: Urban Planet is a Disco-Funky band from Ohrid, bringing vibrant energy and groove.
bio:
üéµ Urban Planet is a Disco-Funky band from Ohrid, bringing vibrant energy and groove to every stage. The five-member lineup features Dimitar Alchev on vocals, Filip Nikolovski on guitar, Nikola Josifoski on keyboards and backing vocals, Hendrik Zinger on bass guitar, and Bobi Damchevski on drums and backing vocals.

Performing together for over five years, the band has become a familiar presence in Ohrid's music scene, as well as in Bitola, Struga, and Skopje. From lively local gigs to private events such as weddings, seminars, and celebrations of all kinds, Urban Planet delivers a dynamic blend of rhythm and soul that gets everyone dancing.

name: Bad Contract
description: Bad Contract is a legendary rap group from Ohrid, formed in 2001.
bio:
Bad Contract is a legendary rap group from Ohrid, formed in 2001. Their name, Bad Contract, was inspired by the significant events surrounding the signing of the Ohrid Agreement. The group consists of two members: Maca MF (Marjan Trpeski) and Meckarov (Naum Doloski).

Their songs and themes are deeply rooted in real-life experiences and events they lived through at the time of recording. Still active today, they continue to record and perform, while also working on their solo projects and new material as Bad Contract.

Some of their most popular tracks include:

‚Ä¢ Alkoholika
‚Ä¢ Srceto na Lavot
‚Ä¢ Dupnime Jako
 ‚Ä¢ Alo (featuring Gazda Paja & Young Palk)

name: Backdoor Band
description: High-energy rock band from Ohrid delivering authentic performances.
bio:
The Backdoor Band ‚Äì Straight out of Ohrid, Macedonia, we've been rocking stages across the country and beyond, winning over crowds with our high-energy performances. For years, we were known as a powerhouse cover band, bringing classic rock and timeless hits to life. But in early 2013, we took things to the next level and began crafting our own original music ‚Äî a raw, authentic sound straight from the heart.

With ≈Ωarko Jakimoski on lead vocals & bass, Laze Farmakoski shredding on lead guitar, and Nikola Kolju≈°evski-Ozzy driving the beat on drums & backing vocals, we deliver pure rock 'n' roll spirit with every show.

So grab a drink, turn it up, and join us on this ride. Keep on rockin' and follow us! ü§òüçªü§ò
